name: Agent
0:
”Alexa, arm Agent in away mode”
”Alexa, disarm Agent”
”Alexa, show Agent camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Agent is a software DVR that runs on Windows, Linux and Mac OS computers. You can arm or disarm agent or view a video feed of all your cameras remotely on supported devices. Requires linking an iSpyConnect.com account.
